import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Global Scan Settings</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v32.06/settings/scan"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"systemOperations"}
x-public: true
```



Returns the global settings for image, host, container, and registry scanning.

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL request:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  "https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/settings/scan"
```


<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

ScanSettings are global settings for image/host/container and registry scanning

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"agentlessScanPeriodMs"} required={false} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AgentlessScanPeriodMS is the agentless scan period in ms - validated for minimum 1 hour or disabled with zero.\n","format":"int64","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cloudPlatformsScanPeriodMs"} required={false} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"CloudPlatformsScanPeriodMS is the cloud platforms scan period in ms - validated for minimum 1 hour or disabled with zero.\n","format":"int64","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"containersScanPeriodMs"} required={false} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ContainersScanPeriodMS is the container scan period in ms - validated for minimum 1 hour or disabled with zero.\n","format":"int64","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"extractArchive"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ExtractArchive indicates whether to search within archive during scan is enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"imagesScanPeriodMs"} required={false} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ImageScanPeriodMS is the image scan period in ms - validated for minimum 1 hour or disabled with zero.\n","format":"int64","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"includeJsDependencies"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"IncludeJsDependencies indicates whether to include packages from the \"dependencies\".\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"registryScanPeriodMs"} required={false} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"RegistryScanPeriodMS is the registry scan period in ms - validated for minimum 1 hour or disabled with zero.\n","format":"int64","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"registryScanRetentionDays"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"RegistryScanRetentionDays is the number of days to keep deleted registry images.\n","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"scanRunningImages"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ScanRunningImages indicates only images that are used by containers should be used.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"serverlessScanPeriodMs"} required={false} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ServerlessScanPeriodMS is the serverless vulnerability scan period in ms - validated for minimum 1 hour or disabled with zero.\n","format":"int64","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"showInfraContainers"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ShowInfraContainers indicates infra containers should be shown.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"showNegligibleVulnerabilities"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ShowNegligibleVulnerabilities indicates whether to display negligible vulnerabilities (low severity or will not be fixed).\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"systemScanPeriodMs"} required={false} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"SystemScanPeriodMS is the host scan period in ms - validated for minimum 1 hour or disabled with zero.\n","format":"int64","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tasDropletsScanPeriodMs"} required={false} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"TASDropletsScanPeriodMS is the TAS scan period in ms - validated for minimum 1 hour or disabled with zero.\n","format":"int64","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"vmScanPeriodMs"} required={false} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"VMScanPeriodMS is the VM image scan period in ms - validated for minimum 1 hour or disabled with zero.\n","format":"int64","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"agentlessScanPeriodMs\": 0,\n  \"cloudPlatformsScanPeriodMs\": 0,\n  \"containersScanPeriodMs\": 0,\n  \"extractArchive\": true,\n  \"imagesScanPeriodMs\": 0,\n  \"includeJsDependencies\": true,\n  \"registryScanPeriodMs\": 0,\n  \"registryScanRetentionDays\": 0,\n  \"scanRunningImages\": true,\n  \"serverlessScanPeriodMs\": 0,\n  \"showInfraContainers\": true,\n  \"showNegligibleVulnerabilities\": true,\n  \"systemScanPeriodMs\": 0,\n  \"tasDropletsScanPeriodMs\": 0,\n  \"vmScanPeriodMs\": 0\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"default"} value={"default"}><div></div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
